title: League Restoring Old Version when Starting Offline
body:
Whenever I open league and the WIFI is off or disconnected, it directly restores the patch to an older version. Then when I restart with the WIFI connected it updates. 

Anyway to stop that from happening?

replies.body: That's a really strange case, I'm wondering if your patcher can't verify updates on wi-fi due to instability.  Our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide might be able to help strengthen your network, but wifi in general can be pretty unstable so you may be better off on wired.
